meanings.definition: A vertical post supporting the apex of a triangular truss.
meanings.sent1: The kingposts held up the top of the roof.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter secured the kingposts to the truss.
meanings.sent3: The kingposts decided to have a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: The kingposts stood tall like guardians of the structure.
meanings.sent5: The kingposts loomed above, strong and sturdy.

meanings.definition: A vertical post supporting the deck of a bridge.
meanings.sent1: The weight of the bridge was supported by the kingposts.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers painted the kingposts to match the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The kingposts on the bridge started singing a song together.
meanings.sent4: The kingposts of the bridge reached down into the river like giant fingers.
meanings.sent5: The kingposts of the bridge were painted a bright red color.
